data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Elciomar Araujo De, Rodrigues, Luis Reginaldo, Kaefer, Igor Luis, Pinto, Karll Cavalcante, Hernandez-Ruz, Emil Jose (2017): A new species of Pristimantis from eastern Brazilian Amazonia (Anura, Craugastoridae). ZooKeys 687: 101-129, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.687.13221, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.687.13221
